pages.title: The Cold Snap Horde
pages.text: The Cold Snap Horde is a band of frosty scoundrels that attack players, villagers and golems alike. They can be found in any cold biome, but can stray out into warmer biomes at times. To stay safe you can wear a $(l:patchouli_jam:cold_snap_horde/hat)Top Hat$() to trick them, so long as they don't watch you put it on.

pages.title: Snowman Gunner
pages.text: This snowman fires coal from a toy gun at his targets. Be careful, as he aims for the eyes.

pages.title: Snowman Stabber
pages.text: This snowman runs around manically trying to stab his victims. Their expressionless face makes some feel unwell.

pages.title: Snowman Snowballer
pages.text: This tradition-conscious snowman will throw $(l:patchouli_jam:cold_snap_horde/snowballs)Snow Covered Rock$() at you.

pages.title: Snowman Gifter
pages.text: This snowman never really believed in the holidays... Beware his presents. What's inside may be bone chilling...

pages.title: Snowman Zapper
pages.text: This snowman has proven to be inventive and resourceful. Watch your back around him, or the results may be shocking.
